org.kiji.rest.representations
Class ExceptionWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.rest.representations.ExceptionWrapper

public final class ExceptionWrapper
extends Object

Class that encapsulates the exception information to be sent back to the client (in JSON) so that it's both parseable by a JSON client as well as human readable in the browser. The standard DropWizard exceptions aren't very informative where as the exceptions that we throw in the resource classes have some details as to why they failed.

Constructor Summary
ExceptionWrapper(javax.ws.rs.core.Response.Status status, Throwable exception)
          Default constructor.
 
Method Summary
 String getException()
          Returns the exception message string for some understanding of why things failed.
 String getExceptionName()
          Gets the name of the exception so that there is some context.
 int getStatus()
          Returns the HTTP status code.
 String getTrace()
          Returns the stacktrace of the underlying exception.
